name: imagiNative
description:
Rayane is a young climber who wakes up in a different reality where she needs to adapt throughout skill and resilience so that everything goes back to the way it once was.

  • 2D
  • Action Adventure
  • Platformer
  • Side-scroller

imagiNative is an individual school project prototype (2021) all the content is limited to a single level with a medium-hard difficulty. The prototype was made in Unity.

The project is obviously incomplete. Nevertheless I hope you have fun 🍄

I strongly recommend a gamepad controller for a better experience.

For further information reach me at: renatopedrosa.info@gmail.com
